title: 8.2 Byo no Hosoku
overview: About Amai Koichi who is good at baking and making sweets trying to help ikemens (good looking, handsome guys). If two people look into each other eyes for 8.2 seconds they will fall in love. Amai is attracted to men as he looks at them and falls for them. Each love interest per episode has a problem so Amai makes sweets/deserts for them in hopes to help them.Â
